name: Compro
indications: prochlorperazine 25 mg suppositories indicated control severe nausea vomiting adults .
warningsAndPrecautions: compro ®prochlorperazine suppositories usp , 25 mg ( adults ) easy open , available : 2 's - ndc 55289-119-02 , 6 's ndc 55289-119-06

indications_original: Prochlorperazine 25 mg suppositories are indicated in the control of severe nausea and vomiting in adults.
warningsAndPrecautions_original:
Compro
 
  ®Prochlorperazine Suppositories USP, 25 mg (for adults) are easy to open, and available in:

 
                  2's - NDC 55289-119-02, 6's NDC 55289-119-06
adverseReactions_original:
Do not use in comatose states or in the presence of large amounts of central nervous system depressants (alcohol, barbiturates, narcotics, etc.).
                  Do not use in pediatric surgery.
                  Do not use in children under 2 years of age or under 20 lbs. Do not use in children for conditions for which dosage has not been established.
